casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Carl Solon COCHRAN. No. 160P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2008. Derrick C. Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Roxann Vaneekhoven, District Attorney," for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of April 2008 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review Under G.S. 7A-31:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of June 2008."
